channel.title: Cv on Karttikeya Mangalam
channel.description: Recent content in Cv on Karttikeya Mangalam

item.title: Future Person Localization in First-Person Videos
Compressing U-net using Knowledge Distillation
item.description: This is my Master’s Research project mentored by Dr. Mathieu Salzmann at Prof. Pascal Fua’s Computer Vision Lab at École polytechnique fédérale de Lausanne, Switzerland. We focus on compressing Fully Convolutional Networks wit skip connections such as the U-net or the Stacked Hourglass Network with minimal loss in performance using Knowledge Distillation (original paper by Hinton et al.). Alongwith proposnig minor changes in the U-net architecture to improve performance, such as introduction of Batch Normalization layer, we compress the original Unet architecture with over 31 Million traininable parameters to just 30,900 paramters (over 100x compression!

item.title: Emotion Recognition from Static Human facial Images
item.description: This was our project for CS771A - Machine Learning Techniques,Fall 2016. We implemented various supervied classifiers such as naive bayes, Kernelized SVMs etc. for emotion classification on human facial Images from the Emotion Recognition in the Wild Challenge 2016 dataset. For supervised classifiers, we engineered suitable feature vectors using Google Cloud Vision API and annotated the ground truth in a semi-supervised fashion using Cloud Visio API and human supervision. Futher we compared the performance of traditional classification approaches against results from pre-trained Convolutional Neural Networks in our project’s final report.
